summary: The grail is not the gold, nor the books of ancient wisdom, but the 3,000 year old DNA of the mummies, which may lead to a cure for malaria.
cast: Elana Drago|William Hope|Nasser Memarzia|Crispin Redman|Darwin Shaw|Boris Terral|Brahim Boukhizzou|Bob Brier|Brahim Choukri|Angelique Corthals|Zahi Hawass|Mohammed Kacha|Abdellah Kloul|Erragragui Lakbir|Christopher Lee|Driss Ouabi|Laafou Ouadii|Mohamen Mehdi Ouazanni|Nasser Ouji|Patricia Remler|Fdila Tabounout
title: Mummies: Secrets of the Pharaohs
